core: Developed automated microfluidic system for cell therapy manufacturing

technical_ic.medium: Developed automated microfluidic system for cell manipulation
technical_ic.detailed: Engineered automated acousto-fluidic device for precise cell manipulation in immunotherapy manufacturing process

research.medium: Developed novel approach to automated cell manipulation
research.detailed: Pioneered acoustic-based microfluidic system for efficient cell processing, combining multiphysics modeling with experimental validation

systems_engineer.detailed: Led system integration of acoustic, fluidic, and control components for automated cell therapy manufacturing

project_lead.medium: Directed development of automated cell processing system
project_lead.detailed: Led cross-functional development of automated cell processing system, coordinating between biology, engineering, and manufacturing teams
